maxBufferSizeBots.comment: Number of frames to keep in buffer for bots

maxBufferSizeBalls.comment: Number of frames to keep in buffer for balls

maxPastTimeBots.comment: max time to keep bots in buffer

betweenPointsTol.comment: Points will only be kept, if the distance is higher than this.

ballSpeedTolerance.comment: if ball is faster than this, ball possession will not be changed.

minDistToBot.comment: minmum distance a bot must have for being in ball possession.

ballPossessionDist.comment: distance difference needed between our and the enemies nearest bot to the ball to declare the ball possessed by us

ballLookaheadOfDefenders.comment: Time [s] - the position of the future ball will be used to determine the danger from the ball position

doubleDefXValue.comment: negative xValue of the ball to set double defenders

blockAngle.comment: Range: (0, pi / 2): If the angle between ball and x axis is greater than this value only one defender will try to block the ball

numX.comment: Number of points to check on x axis

numY.comment: Number of points to check on y axis

numTopValues.comment: How many top values should be searched for?

visRaySize.comment: ray size for visibility check (excluding bot radius)

overBotChipDistance.comment: Distance we can chip over other bots [mm]

angleSteps.comment: Number of points on one circle of advanced pass targets

distanceSteps.comment: Number of points on one advanced pass target ray

maxDistance.comment: Maximum distance between advanced pass targets and bot [mm]

markedWaitTime.comment: Time to wait before bot will be considered marked [ms]

markedBotFactor.comment: Will be aplied to all advanced pass target scores of marked bots

maxMarkerDistance.comment: Only bots within this distance will be considered as markers [mm]

maxSurroundingDistance.comment: Opponent bots whithin this radius from the kicker will be considered as additional markers [mm]
